statements: SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments;
SELECT reviewer_id, deadline FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id = 5;
SELECT assignment_id, deadline FROM reviewer_assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, assignment_id FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id = 101 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id, deadline FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE assignment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT reviewer_id, assignment_id FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY assignment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' AND reviewer_id = 102;
SELECT MAX(assignment_id) AS max_assignment_id FROM reviewer_assignments;
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id, review_deadline FROM reviewer_assignments
SELECT reviewer_id, assignment_id, review_deadline FROM reviewer_assignments
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id = 2
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id, review_deadline FROM reviewer_assignments ORDER BY review_deadline DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id = 5;
SELECT reviewer_id, review_deadline FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE review_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_id, deadline FROM reviewer_deadlines WHERE deadline <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id, review_deadline FROM reviewer_assignments JOIN reviewer_deadlines ON reviewer_assignments.reviewer_id = reviewer_deadlines.reviewer_id ORDER BY review_deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reviewer;
SELECT reviewer_name FROM Reviewer;
SELECT assignment_id, review_date FROM PeerReview;
SELECT reviewer_id, deadline_date FROM Assignment;
SELECT * FROM Reviewer JOIN Assignment ON Reviewer.reviewer_id = Assignment.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM Reviewer;
SELECT Reviewer.reviewer_name, Assignment.deadline_date FROM Reviewer INNER JOIN Assignment ON Reviewer.reviewer_id = Assignment.reviewer_id;

SELECT Reviewer.reviewer_name, Assignment.deadline_date, PeerReview.feedback FROM Reviewer INNER JOIN Assignment ON Reviewer.reviewer_id = Assignment.reviewer_id INNER JOIN PeerReview ON Assignment.assignment_id = PeerReview.assignment_id;

SELECT Reviewer.reviewer_name, COUNT(Assignment.assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM Reviewer LEFT JOIN Assignment ON Reviewer.reviewer_id = Assignment.reviewer_id GROUP BY Reviewer.reviewer_name;
SELECT Assignment.deadline_date, PeerReview.review_date FROM PeerReview LEFT JOIN Assignment ON PeerReview.assignment_id = Assignment.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM Reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_name, assigned_reviews FROM Reviewers WHERE assigned_reviews > 0;
SELECT submission_title, submission_date FROM Submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, deadline FROM Reviews WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, submission_title FROM Reviewers JOIN Reviews ON Reviewers.reviewer_id = Reviews.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM Reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, assigned_reviews FROM Reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;

SELECT Reviews.review_id, Reviewers.reviewer_name, Submissions.submission_title FROM Reviews INNER JOIN Reviewers ON Reviews.reviewer_id = Reviewers.reviewer_id INNER JOIN Submissions ON Reviews.submission_id = Submissions.submission_id;

SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_name, submission_title, assigned_date FROM Assignments INNER JOIN Reviewers ON Assignments.reviewer_id = Reviewers.reviewer_id INNER JOIN Submissions ON Assignments.submission_id = Submissions.submission_id ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS reviews_count FROM Reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM papers LIMIT 5;
SELECT paper_title, submission_date FROM papers WHERE submission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT review_id, paper_id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM reviews WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT paper_title, submission_date, submission_date AS submission_date_formatted FROM papers WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_id, reviewer_id, paper_id FROM reviewer_assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT papers.paper_id, paper_title, submission_date, reviewer_name FROM papers JOIN reviewers ON papers.paper_id = reviewers.reviewer_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise, review_content, review_date FROM reviewers JOIN reviews ON reviewers.reviewer_id = reviews.reviewer_id;
SELECT papers.paper_id, paper_title, submission_date, due_date FROM papers JOIN deadlines ON papers.paper_id = deadlines.paper_id WHERE due_date < '2023-01-01';
